json.text: Hi guys, this is Mark from MarkTeacher.com with an advanced IELTS speaking

question and answer. This IELTS example
answer is about advertising. What types

of advertising are popular in your
country? In the UK, probably the most

common types of adverts are definitely
online. I see video adverts when I try

and watch YouTube, I see adverts when I
read the news on news websites and I'm

trying to read articles. Also on TV - every
15 minutes there's an advert! It's loud, it's very attention-grabbing,
and all the most popular adverts these

days tend to have an animal or a catch
phrase - something that really sticks in

your head. As well as that, when I wait at
the train station or at a bus stop

there's often a poster advertising a new
film or a new smartphone or a new piece

of technology. So those are probably the
most common types of adverts in the UK.
Thanks for watching - check out MarkTeacher.com for more IELTS courses
